description: {"blocks":[{"key":"35v86","text":"CODEX system is the combination of an (1) oligo-nucleotide based antibody labeling-detection technique, (2) a microfluidics instrument coupled with an inverted microscope capable of whole slide scanning, and an (3) ImageJ-based analysis platform. This experimental setup allows the automation of immunofluorescence signal detection across several staining cycles of a single tissue section","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"t8b7","text":"This protocol describes detailed methods used in CODEX sample preparation and staining at the Laszik Lab.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"90kae","text":"QA/QC Parameters","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e4mht","text":"1. Visual inspection of whole slide digital images of the stains. Every stain (channel-target) in each section is visually evaluated.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e81ds","text":"2. Positive controls. A positive control stain is performed with each CODEX stain on a “control” kidney with inflammation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ecknn","text":"3. Automation. Using standardized operator-independent automated validated protocols.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6rj64","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7n9n7","text":"CODEX data quality management processing","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":40}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2no7e","text":"All CODEX data generated go through a rigorous quality control process that includes visual assessment of the processed images and a review of the segmented files, both test specimens and on slide controls. In addition to the stains, cellular and compartmental segmentation fidelity is key to downstream analysis. Unexpected staining pattern and/or artifacts on the processed images are documented; if correctable, such as those related to folding or edge artifact among others, the images are manually annotated to define regions that could be rescued for analytics. If corrective measures are not an option, such as that with a failed stain the data for that particular stain will be excluded from the analysis. Segmented images, both with cellular and compartmental segmentation are also reviewed for accuracy; once again, if abnormal/unexpected segmentation is detected, depending on the nature of such finding either corrective measures are implemented or the case/stain is flagged and excluded from further analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fo06l","text":"Place generated 1x CODEX Buffer in the CODEX Buffer Bottle, labeled Bottle One and DMSO in the amber bottle, labeled Bottle Two.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9luuh","text":"Load the stage insert.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a0p4q","text":"Untwist the knobs at the top of the stage insert to remove the lid with the fluidic lines.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2at75","text":"Remove the old coverslip using the forceps, push the corners of the gaskets towards the center to release the seal between the coverslip and the gasket.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cs7k2","text":"Gently remove the coverslip using the forceps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"enl4t","text":"If the coverslip breaks, remove all glass pieces and rinse with water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4vb4","text":"Soak fresh gaskets in 1X CODEX Buffer or in Storage Buffer for a few seconds.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ea8ku","text":"Place the first gasket inside the squared well at the center of the stage insert.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"n0be","text":"Gently tap with forceps to ensure it adheres to the stage insert surface.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"68mu4","text":"Gently place the tissue sample on top of the gasket, making sure it is perfectly inserted and the tissue is facing upwards.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4mf96","text":"Quickly and gently tap the coverslip edges with the forceps to ensure it adheres to the gasket.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eoces","text":"Quickly place the second gasket on top of the sample coverslip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3gte1","text":"Quickly place the lid on top of the stage insert.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bu42t","text":"Secure the lid by turning the knobs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a2d75","text":"Dispense   of 1X CODEX Buffer on the corner of the sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ctfqm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"700","error":false,"guid":"C7FAD3C0F5FC11EB90D7E7EF1F8015DA","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9uri8","text":"Remove any salts formed on the coverslip from drying using a kimwipe with Milli-Q water. Use a dry kimwipe to remove residual liquid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7id93","text":"Stain the CODEX sample with HOECHST.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bvodd","text":"Thaw CODEX Nuclear Staining Solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fun5s","text":"Have the   of 1x CODEX Buffer set aside previously within reach.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2c4oq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"7","error":false,"guid":"1C33A610F5FD11EB90D7E7EF1F8015DA","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"r25u","text":"Remove the solution within the sample well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8aem9","text":"Add   of Nuclear Stain Solution to the sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"jsbp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"700","error":false,"guid":"3A15F2A0F5FD11EB90D7E7EF1F8015DA","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

Cover it from light.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":18,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d6nke","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"431CE430F5FD11EB90D7E7EF1F8015DA","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"45D610C0F5FD11EB90D7E7EF1F8015DA","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8reep","text":"Add   of 1x CODEX Buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c68ni","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"700","error":false,"guid":"76A94D70F5FD11EB90D7E7EF1F8015DA","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3vd1v","text":"Launch the CODEX Instrument Management Software and enter cycle, marker id and exposure time information. Minimize the window.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ajmdi","text":"Place the plate with the CODEX-tagged dyes in its designated place in the instrument.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
